declarations.comments: The `` HTML element represents an image in the document. #### Example: ```purescript img { src: "image.jpg" , alt: "A beautiful scenery" } ``` #### Common Attributes: | Name | Type | Description | |---------|--------|-------------| | `src` | String | source URL of the image | | `alt` | String | alternative text for the image for blind and otherwise impaired users |
declarations.title: img
